title: RTF - Maya 2014 - Custom Skin help.
body:
Hey there, Guys.

I'm having some trouble exporting skins from Maya2014.
I’ve got both Maya2014, and Riot File Translator installed. The .mll file is in the plugin folder, and the Icons/Scripts folders from the MayaFolder.Zip are in the Icons/Script folders in Maya2014. However, when I try to export the skin I get the error “// Error : line 0: Could not save file “(location I’m exporting to)”
I’ve tried redownloading/reinstalling everything several times, yet it still won’t work for me.

Here's an expanded picture of the entire error message log.
http://i.imgur.com/OMxL3iF.jpg

I was hoping someone would be able to help me out.

(I wasn't too sure where to post this)

yer a wizard 'arry.

Besides, this has nothing to do with downloading a custom skin?
